meta.description: Determine the number of bus and car trips needed to transport chickens to minimize total time.

sets.name: VEHICLES
sets.description: Types of vehicles available for transporting chickens.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of each vehicle type in terms of number of chickens.

params.name: time_per_trip
params.description: Time taken per trip by each vehicle type in hours.

vars.name: trips
vars.description: Number of trips made by each vehicle type.

objective.name: min_total_time
objective.description: Minimize the total time needed to transport all chickens.

constraints.name: max_bus_trips
constraints.description: There can be at most 10 bus trips.

constraints.name: min_car_trip_percentage
constraints.description: At least 60% of the trips must be by car.
